data.title: Soni Razdan sarcastically reacts to Mukesh Khanna's take on Zeenat Aman's live-in relationship comment
data.meta_description: Recently Zeenat Aman's comment about live-in relationship went viral and caused quite a bit of controversy. Soni Razdan has shared her views, reacting to Mukesh Khanna's take.
data.text:
Zeenat Aman was a sensation and will always remain a sensation. The veteran actress has been making headlines for her comeback and her amazing BTS stories from the sets of the films that she has worked in so far. It's like a digital biography or a scrapbook. Apart from that, Zeenat Aman has been making headlines for her statements. Her recent comment on a Live-in relationship has gone viral. Several veteran celebs from the industry such as Mumtaz and Mukesh Khanna to name a few reacted to her take. And now, Soni Razdan has also reacted to the same.

Catch up on the latest Entertainment News and TV News updates now at your fingertips. Just follow BollywoodLife's WhatsApp channel.

Soni Razdan reacts to Mukesh Khanna's take on Zeenat Aman's live-in comment

Mukesh Khanna slammed Zeenat Aman for asking people to follow Western culture. He states that the live-in relationship is the culture of the West and that Zeenat has lived her whole life as per the Western culture. Now, Alia Bhatt's mother, Soni Razdan came across his take on Zeenat's views about why people should live together. The actress seemingly mocked the Shaktimaan actor for the same. She reacted to the same with sarcasm. "Gosh. Can’t imagine what would happen if a couple live together in a ‘live -in’ relationship and don’t get along. The mind boggles,"(sic).

Have a look at Soni Razdan's comment here:

Watch this old video of Soni Razdan from an interview here:

What did Mukesh Khanna say about Zeenat Aman?

While talking to Dainik Jagran that the idea of a Live-in relationship is not recognized in Indian culture and history. He said the roots of live-in relationships have been found in the Western culture. The Mahabharat actor said that it is not acceptable for a boy and a girl to live together like a husband and a wife before marriage. He questioned what if they did not get along well. Mukesh said that people should think before speaking.

What did Zeenat Aman say that caused so much controversy?

Zeenat Aman had shared a relationship advice that fans asked for in the comments section of her post. She felt that people should live together to understand each other better and before getting the families and the government involved in the matter.

Stay tuned to BollywoodLife for the latest scoops and updates from Bollywood, Hollywood, South, TV and Web-Series.
